title: FOXHEAD EUROPE Presents  MXON - LATVIA 2014
description:
This year’s FIM Motocross of Nations marked the 68th edition in style as a total of 14 Fox athletes were selected to ride for the country and battle it out in Kegums, Latvia.
Once again the pressure was on Team USA to come out on top with our own Ryan Dungey leading the pack, his 6th year as captain for the team. Chad Reed also made a return after three years to fight for Team Australia along with Max Nagl riding for Team Germany and Glenn Coldenhoff for Team Netherlands. Find out from the riders what makes this event so special and see what went down on the track.

Music:
Artist: CTZNSHP
Song: We’re All for Fire

Artist: Broken Bones
Song: Sun Gods in Exile
